soul-of-south.title: The Soul of South India
soul-of-south.description: Uncover the serene beauty of Kerala with a 7-day journey through hill stations, spice gardens, backwaters, and heritage towns.
soul-of-south.longDescription: Kerala, often referred to as "God's Own Country," is a stunning destination on the southwestern coast of India, known for its lush landscapes, tranquil backwaters, scenic hill stations, and pristine beaches. The state offers a perfect blend of natural beauty, rich cultural heritage, and unique experiences, from serene houseboat cruises in Alleppey to the lush tea plantations of Munnar. Kerala is also famous for its vibrant festivals, traditional dance forms like Kathakali, and delicious cuisine featuring coconut and spices. Whether seeking relaxation, adventure, or wellness, Kerala provides an unforgettable escape for every traveler.
includes: All transfers and sightseeing by Personalized AC Car
All Toll tax, parking fees & driver allowances
excludes: Gondola Tickets or any other tickets
Special clothing and Winter-wear on rent
Entrance fees to monuments and museum
Other meals not mentioned laundry, telephone calls, and incidentals.
Any personal expenses. Room service and special orders. Alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.
Any expense arising due to unforeseen circumstances is not included.

activities: Visit Mughal gardens: Shalimar Bagh, Nishat Bagh, Chashme Shahi
Optional visit to Bolgatty Palace or Shikara ride
Shopping and relaxing at Marine Drive

kerala-escapade.title: Kerala Escapade: Sea, Hills & Backwaters

kerala-escapade.description: Journey through Kerala’s pristine hills, tranquil backwaters, and scenic beaches with this 9-day immersive itinerary.

kerala-southern-shores.title: From Backwaters to the Southern Shores
kerala-southern-shores.location: Munnar, Thekkady, Alleppey, Trivandrum, Kanyakumari – India
kerala-southern-shores.description: A scenic 9-day journey through Kerala’s hills, backwaters, and beaches, ending at India’s southernmost tip in Kanyakumari.

gods-own-itinerary.title: God's Own Itinerary
gods-own-itinerary.description: A 6-day exploration through Kerala’s cultural, hill, and backwater gems: Kochi, Munnar, and Alleppey.
